title: Organizational Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Virtual Escape Room-Based Pharmacy Career Exploration Project

context.prior_knowledge: General understanding of basic life sciences and pharmaceuticals
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can accurately describe 80%+ of major pharmaceutical job roles (compounding, research, clinical practice, etc.) through virtual escape game missions
Learners can systematically present pharmaceutical education pathways (bachelor’s/master’s/Ph.D./licensing exam) based on in-game decision-making processes
Learners can analyze factors to consider when choosing a pharmaceutical career path (aptitude, social contribution, expertise, etc.) according to evaluation rubrics through team project outcomes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
